record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - March 12, 2008)

[Page: H1598]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous materials thereon on S. 2745.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Minnesota?
